expo.name: Quarantine Pro
expo.description: The app is all about how long you have been quarantining. As a user, you input the date when you started isolating and the app is going to display a fun message to tell you how far you have come in the quarantine “game”. This app is built wih the awesome team Jscrambler for a new React Native and Expo blog post. This app uses various Expo modules such fonts (useFonts hook), expo-web-browser and other modules like date-time-picker-modal, momentjs and custom font.
